participant_1.background:

I'm not sure of my current weight, but I'm working on it.
I look forward to sharing my opinions with others and starting a new life in Australia.
I haven't been in a fight, but I've been in situations where I felt threatened because of my sexuality.

content.text: Hi there! Welcome to Australia! I'm a big fan of dragon figurines. Do you have a favorite dragon figurine?
Hi! Thanks, I'm excited to be here! I really like my crystal dragon figurine. It's really cool and looks pretty.
Cool! I've always liked crystal dragons. Do you have any other hobbies besides collecting dragon figurines?
I like to play video games and watch movies. I'm also a big fan of pizza.
Nice! I love video games and movies too. I'm not a big fan of pizza, but I do like pasta.
I love pasta too! I usually have eggs and bacon for breakfast, but I'll sometimes have pasta if I'm feeling like something different.
Eggs and bacon are a classic breakfast. I usually have oatmeal or cereal for breakfast.
I like oatmeal too! I usually have it with fruit and nuts.
That sounds delicious! I'm going to have to try that sometime.
Thanks for the tip! I'm looking forward to getting to know you better.
Me too! I'm excited to see what Australia has in store for me.
